alert.note: Alert for Kittson (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 3:30PM CDT until May 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wild Rice River (MN) at Hendrum affecting Norman County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Two Rivers River near Hallock. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 802.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Hallock Dam spillway at Gilbert Park closed to the public. Culverts with flappers are checked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 800.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon to a crest of 802.2 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 802.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
